notes
property.value:
== Big World 1939 ==
This map is based on the original TripleA map Big World 1942, but set instead in 1939. It has the same layout, but includes Germany, America, Britain, Slovakia, Finland, Russia, China, Japan, Italy, Canada, Romania, and France (12 players total). Note that this map is set in late 1939; America was not yet part of the war. However it was entirely an option for them to begin fighting, so they are included as a player.
